snippet: Athletes at the 2014 Winter Games barrel down an icy chute at 80 miles per hour and fly more than the length of a football field off a jump, among other physical feats. In these videos, learn their tricks and techniques — and then see how they used...
lead_paragraph: Athletes at the 2014 Winter Games barrel down an icy chute at 80 miles per hour and fly more than the length of a football field off a jump, among other physical feats. In these videos, learn their tricks and techniques — and then see how they used them to take home the gold.

headline.main: Winter Tales of Speed and Distance
